mapper.select: SELECT ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_day_of_the_week AS workerDayOfTheWeek ,ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_type AS workerType ,ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_start_time AS workerStartTime ,ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_end_time AS workerEndTime ,ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_date AS workerDate ,ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_special_note AS workerSpecialNote ,ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_Approval_status AS workerApprovalStatus ,ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_registration_day AS workerRegistrationDay ,ilban_human.human_name AS humanName ,haksa_department.dept_name_korean AS deptNameKorean ,haksa_job_rank.job_rank_name_korean AS rankNameKorean FROM ilban_duty_worker INNER JOIN ilban_appointment ON ilban_duty_worker.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_appointment.appointment_school_personnel_number INNER JOIN ilban_human ON ilban_duty_worker.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_human.student_teacher_no INNER JOIN haksa_department ON ilban_appointment.dept_code = haksa_department.dept_code INNER JOIN haksa_job_rank ON ilban_appointment.job_rank_code = haksa_job_rank.job_rank_code ORDER BY ilban_duty_worker.duty_worker_date DESC
